name: Age of Monster: League
description:
"Age of Monster: League" restores the Mega Evolution of the animation and makes some innovations based on the classic plots and exquisite characters. In addition, it also adopts the latest image rendering technology. The brand-new feature and unique plots await you to experience!

Collecting Illustrations Forging the Strongest Team

Collecting Monster illustrations is always the favorite thing for most players. You can find the most comprehensive Monster illustrations in this game, including each Monster’s unique info. Just start collecting Monsters! This is also what you must do to become the best Monster trainer.

Monster Guild, Amazing Group Battle

All trainers from all over the world no matter strong or weak can find a place in the Monster Guild. In the guild you can: challenge diverse guild dungeons and all kinds of Monsters; fight against strong enemies together with your friends for honor; save Monsters and train them; enhance your strength and enjoy rich guild benefits! Here you will experience the fun of playing with friends and find the joy of growth and sense of fulfillment!
